stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  GROUP PROJECTS  SO MANY PAPERS
comments: Julie is sweet woman and always makes sure to check in with you so that you\'re not overwhelmed, but she is honestly the worst professors i\'ve ever had. She changes the syllabus almost every class, assigns way to many reading assignments (Even though its a production class there\'s no need for reading) and has been 40 min late more than once

tag_professor: SO MANY PAPERS (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Julie was a gift. I went into Documentary Production with little idea of what to expect, but I found it to be one of the most rewarding experiences I ever had at Emerson. The work was challenging, but I never got bored, and always felt like I was breaking new ground. She was ridiculously supportive of everyone and their work.

tag_professor: SO MANY PAPERS (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: The best professor I\'ve had at Emerson College and defines how film classes should be taught. She blends her own professional experience with her unique and honest personality to create such a satisfying environment for the creative minded student. She openly cares about every student\'s vision and potential more than any professor I\'ve ever had.

tag_professor: SO MANY PAPERS (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Very knowledgeable instructor, she has done many decades of work in the field and really KNOWS HER STUFF. Go see her after class, she is more than willing to help with anything you need. She goes above and beyond most instructors to help out. Because of Julie, I landed a great internship, which turned into an amazing job. She\'s a good lady to know!

tag_professor: SO MANY PAPERS (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: really nice lady, but if you have done shoots and have done any type of production with extracariculars you\'ll prob not find the class too usefull.

tag_professor: SO MANY PAPERS (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: I had Julie last semester for Video Field, and I have her again for Documentary. She is definitely more suited to teach Documentary Production, and it\'s actually my favorite class this semester. Documentary is Julie\'s main field, and we\'re actually getting real world experience and doing really cool projects. The class is laid back but structured.

tag_professor: SO MANY PAPERS (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Please, do not take any of her classes! I\'m usually pretty tolerable with professors, but Julie is just not meant to teach. She changed the syllabus multiple times and was really outdated. She was unorganized. I would say most of the students in the class knew more than she did about what she was teaching. Please heed advice, you won\'t regret it.

tag_professor: SO MANY PAPERS (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Julie is starting to improve. I think she realizes how jam-packed the syllabus is and that we can only do so much in such a limited amount of time. She\'s starting to treat us like the professionals we aspire to be. Things are looking up.

tag_professor: SO MANY PAPERS (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: I\'m really not sure how I feel about Julie. She seemed really nice on the first day of class, but everything went down hill after that. She doesn\'t always explain herself clearly, and she can be condescending. If you know what you\'re doing, your intelligence may be insulted. If you don\'t know what you\'re doing, you\'ll probably be insulted anyway.
